title: India's services sector growth improves slightly in April on new order inflows

title: In M.P.’s Duglai, a remote hamlet, unprecedented civic push follows a horrific crime

title: Rajasthan BJP leaders in Gujarat to attend training camp; Congress questions need
content: According to the party sources, the training sessions will cover the subjects such as the fundamentals of good governance, internal discipline and communication, public engagement strategies, understanding legislative procedures and effective dissemination of the government’s schemes.

content: The woman, currently residing abroad, had lodged the complaint against Shajan Skaria, accusing him of airing defamatory content

title: Sambhal ‘critical’ for BJP in all yardstick, says party’s organisational in-charge
content: Speaking to The Hindu, Pushkar Mishra, Organisational Election In-charge of the party said broader representation of all social segment has been the aim of the ruling party, pushing the West U.P. district as ‘critical’ for the BJP in all parameters.

content: Maharashtra Day has been celebrated since 1960 on May 1, along with International Labour Day. Looking back at the history of the formation of the State, one must acknowledge the contribution of Lokshahir Annabhau Sathe and Dr. B. R. Ambedkar

title: The implications of caste enumeration
content: While there is a vast political leadership who came through the lanes of OBC politics, there has also been a concentration of certain OBC communities in these spaces. The upcoming Census, with caste enumeration, could create a window of opportunity for the inclusion of those communities who have been left behind

title: Pak troops resorts to unprovoked firing along LoC in 8 sectors across J-K, Indian Army retaliates
content: Indian Army responded in a proportionate manner to the firing in areas opposite Kupwara, Baramulla, Poonch, Rajouri, Mendhar, Naushera, Sunderbani, and Akhnoor in J&K

title: Internship for undergraduate students, mandatory under NEP, remains a challenge for West Bengal colleges
content: As the National Education Policy, implemented in 2023, a student can exit college at any time — after a year, two years, or after finishing the full course — but not without doing an internship

title: BJP’s Vanathi Srinivasan flags security concerns in Coimbatore
content: Leading a protest in Coimbatore to condemn the Pahalgam attack BJP MLA Vanathi Srinivasan criticised the Tamil Nadu government’s approach to national security.

content: The embassy said, among the heroes we pay tribute to is your late father, Biju Patnaik ji, a valiant pilot of the Indian National Airways who participated in the Stalingrad Operation

content: The Dorabeel Village Grazing Field Protection Convening Committee said the move to hand over the land in Kamrup district to a Kolkata-based company would affect more than 3,000 families

content: The West Bengal Chief Minister claims the Murshidabad riots were planned and promises to expose the people behind it soon

content: The incident took place reportedly on April 29 and the explosion caused the complete collapse of the mixing unit structure of the plant

content: Legislative Party leader Vijay Wadettiwar said that the Sadbhavna Yatra aims to bridge hearts and unite communities and fix the damage done by the BJP since 2014

content: The Bengal Chief Minister also expressed concern over reports of attacks on Bengali-speaking migrant workers in Odisha and said that they are targeted for speaking in Bengali

title: Parachutes for uncrewed spaceflight of Gaganyaan mission flagged off
content: Developed indigenously by the ADRDE, the sequential system of parachutes is designed for Gaganyaan programme tests which are planned for later this year

content: Assam’s immigration detention regime is not just a threat to the liberty and well-being of those caught up within it; it also raises important questions of constitutional principles

content: The MIGM is designed to enhance the Indian Navy's capabilities against modern stealth ships and submarines

content: The Tamil Nadu police appeal to those travelling with VIPs not to pressure the drivers of bulletproof cars to speed

content: The ‘X’ account ‘Pakistan Cyber Force’ states that the group has allegedly gained access to sensitive data from Indian Military Engineering Service (MES) and Manohar Parrikar Institute of Defence Studies and Analysis (MPIDSA), defence source in the know says

title: Activists ask Centre to withdraw genome-edited rice varieties, say it’s unsafe
content: Venugopal Badaravada, a member of the Indian Council of Agricultural Research’s (ICAR) governing body representing farmers, said the announcement reflects a troubling trend of prioritising ‘science-for-headlines’ over ‘solutions-for-the-farm’.

title: Lufthansa, Air France, others avoid Pakistan airspace amid tensions
content: Pakistan’s overflight fee earnings are expected to be impacted by the loss in revenue, putting a financial strain on an already low on foreign currency reserves State Bank of Pakistan.

title: Jammu and Kashmir Government to respond to Sinha’s objections over proposed business rules soon
content: The Transaction of Business Rules is aimed at defining the functioning and jurisdiction of the Lieutenant-Governor, the Chief Minister and the Council of Ministers in the Union Territory

title: Akhilesh hits out at plan to use cow dung-based paint on govt. buildings in Uttar Pradesh
content: SP leaders alleged that such actions were aimed at diverting the attention of the masses, and hiding the failures of the State government

title: Family of captured BSF jawan hopeful of swap with detained Pakistani ranger
content: Hours after the terror attack in Kashmir’s Pahalgam, Pakistani forces detained the BSF constable after he reportedly dozed off under a tree in Pakistani territory along the international border in Punjab’s Ferozepur.

title: Comprehensive insurance scheme for KSRTC employees in Kerala
content: Employees need not pay premium for scheme. KSRTC will be fully computerised to allow passengers to buy tickets using UPI and card transactions on all KSRTC buses

title: 'I knew it wasn't a miss': Gordon's 3 stuns OKC
content: For the second time in these playoffs, Aaron Gordon delivered the winning shot after Denver rallied from a double-digit deficit to stun the Thunder at home in Game 1 of their Western Conference semifinal series.

title: Isles win draft lottery for first time since '09
content: The New York Islanders won the NHL draft lottery on Monday and vaulted nine teams -- including the last-place San Jose Sharks -- in winning the opportunity to have the No. 1 pick, marking the first time the franchise will have that position since 2009.

title: Celts 'bit off' as shooting woes reach historic level
content: The Celtics might've finally reached a saturation point as they missed a record 45 3-pointers Monday night as the Knicks took advantage in a 108-105 Game 1 overtime victory.

title: Williams wilts again, sees ERA top 10 as Yankee
content: New York reliever Devin Williams' nightmare season continued on Monday night with another poor outing in the Yankees' 4-3 loss to the San Diego Padres, as the right-hander was charged with three runs, increasing his ERA to 10.03 in 14 games this season.

title: Ravens make 'tough decision,' cut kicker Tucker
content: The Ravens on Monday released kicker Justin Tucker, parting ways with the NFL's most accurate kicker who is being investigated by the league for sexual misconduct.

title: Leafs goalie Stolarz exits win after elbow to head
content: In Game 1 of the Eastern Conference semifinals, Maple Leafs goaltender Anthony Stolarz exited midway through the second period of his team's 5-4 win over the Panthers on Monday, after taking an elbow to the head from Florida forward Sam Bennett.

title: Shildt, irate over Tatis ejection, throws his glasses
content: San Diego manager Mike Shildt was so angry with plate umpire Adrian Johnson that he made a spectacle by tossing his glasses en route to an ejection during the Padres' 4-3 victory over the Yankees on Monday night.

content: Great value on Malaki Starks? Reach on Isaac TeSlaa? We asked 17 experts to weigh in on the NFL draft.

content: Jared Curtis, the nation's top QB recruit has made his decision. Here's what the move means for the teams and the 2026 class.

title: Who will kick for Ravens after Justin Tucker release? A look at his likely successor
content: After drafting the Arizona kicker in the sixth round, the team will likely turn to Tyler Loop after releasing Tucker on Monday.

title: Chelsea-Liverpool lessons, Napoli close to Serie A title, Bayern clinch Bundesliga, more
content: Chelsea beat Liverpool, Napoli moved closer to another Serie A title, and Bayern Munich clinched the Bundesliga without playing: Gab Marcotti recaps the weekend.

title: Sources: Madrid want Alexander-Arnold for CWC
content: Real Madrid want Trent Alexander-Arnold to join them for this summer's Club World Cup, sources have told ESPN, and now plan talks with Liverpool to negotiate his early release.

title: Arteta: 'Have to give your life' to reach final
content: Mikel Arteta has said Arsenal need to be ready to give their life to reach the Champions League final.

title: Kane targets trophy 'number two' after title win
content: England striker Harry Kane said it feels sweet to finally end his career-long trophy drought after securing the Bundesliga title with Bayern Munich

title: Mourinho silent on future as Fener title hopes fade
content: José Mourinho refused to confirm whether he will remain at Fenerbahce next season after Sunday's defeat to Besiktas left them adrift in the title race.

title: Racing's Borges gets 3-match ban for ref push
content: Racing Louisville FC midfielder Ary Borges has been suspended for an additional three matches for pushing the center referee after a recent match.

title: Kroos: Pedri 'more important' to Barça than Yamal
content: Former Real Madrid player Toni Kroos believes Barcelona's Pedri is the best midfielder in the world and more important to his team than Lamine Yamal, Robert Lewandowski and Raphinha.

title: Mac Allister: Liverpool 'just getting started'
content: Liverpool midfielder Alexis Mac Allister hopes winning the Premier League title this season is "just the beginning of something great."

title: CAS to rule in León's Club World Cup dispute
content: A verdict is expected Tuesday in Liga MX club León's legal dispute with FIFA over entry to the Club World Cup in the United States next month.

title: Hamilton Miami radio drama born out of Ferrari's lack of pace
content: Lewis Hamilton's radio messages weren't Ferrari's biggest problem in Miami, it was the middling performance.

title: Miami GP showcases F1's youth movement, American popularity
content: From the drivers in the cars to the fans in the stands, young people made F1's Miami GP yet another success.

title: A.J. Brown's proposal to girlfriend includes performance by John Legend
content: The Philadelphia Eagles wide receiver will don his second ring in a several month stretch after helping the Eagles win Super Bowl LIX in February.

title: Overhyped and underdelivered: Only one fighter gets an A from highly anticipated weekend
content: From Ryan Garcia to Naoya Inoue, Andreas Hale looks at the top fighters to compete last weekend and grades their performances.

title: West Virginia football unveils throwback uniforms that pay homage to 1965 team
content: The threads, unveiled Monday, will feature tweaks to the team's usual color scheme and a modern version of the helmets worn by the 1965 squad.

title: Grading MLB's City Connect uniforms: Snakes launch best look of 2025
content: From the pastel Padres to the Motor City Tigers and beyond, we break down MLB's City Connect uniforms.

title: Stanley Cup playoff odds: Panthers, Stars are favorites to hoist Cup
content: Every playoff team's odds to win the 2025 Stanley Cup and favorites for the Conn Smythe Trophy for playoff MVP.

content: ESPN's Paul Carcaterra ranks the 2025 PLL draft's top prospects and matches teams up with players who best fit their needs.

title: Rankings, projections, strategy and cheat sheets
content: Rankings, projections, player profiles, draft strategies -- we've got everything you need to dominate your fantasy women's basketball draft from every angle.

title: Waiver wire: Why settle for one rising star when you can have two?
content: Tristan H. Cockcroft outlines the players you should be claiming off the waiver wire and who you should be dropping from fantasy rosters.

title: MLS: Vancouver remain top; Seattle, Philadelphia soar up
content: The Vancouver Whitecaps continue to dominate the top spot in the latest edition of ESPN's MLS Power Rankings.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United open talks with Osimhen
content: Initial talks have taken place between Manchester United and the representatives of on-loan Galatasaray striker Victor Osimhen. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Nationwide civil defence mock drill on May 7: All you need to know
content: Following the Pahalgam terror attack and rising security concerns, the ministry of home affairs will conduct a nationwide civil defence mock drill across 244 districts on May 7. The exercise aims to enhance emergency preparedness and public safety mechanisms by training civilians and testing critical infrastructure. Union home secretary Govind Mohan will review preparations with key officials.

title: Pakistani national detained near LoC in Poonch sector
content: The Indian Army apprehended a Pakistani national near the Line of Control in the Poonch sector of Jammu and Kashmir on Tuesday, officials confirmed. This apprehension has heightened alertness among security forces, especially after the recent terror attack in Pahalgam, which resulted in 28 fatalities. Security forces have intensified surveillance and patrolling in the region to prevent further infiltration attempts.

title: Pahalgam fallout: India makes Chenab run dry, for now
content: Following a terror attack and the suspension of the Indus Water Treaty, India has restricted water flow from the Baglihar and Salal dams on the Chenab River. This unprecedented action led to dramatically low water levels, allowing residents to walk across the riverbed for the first time in memory. The move highlights India's ability to regulate water resources and has sparked debate over the treaty's impact on the region.

title: IPL playoffs scenarios: With 15 matches to go, MI have 75% chance of progressing
content: With 15 IPL 2025 league stage games remaining, RCB, GT, and PBKS are almost certain for the playoffs, while MI is a strong contender. DC has a fair chance, but LSG and KKR face slim odds. Probabilities are calculated based on 32,768 possible result combinations, assessing each team's chances of finishing in the top four and top two.

title: CEOs Microsoft, Adobe, IBM, Cognizant and others warn US is falling behind
content: Top CEOs, including Microsoft's Satya Nadella, are urging the U.S. to mandate computer science and AI education in K-12 schools. They warn that America is lagging behind countries like China and Singapore. The leaders emphasize that a single computer science course could boost wages by 8% and unlock significant economic potential.

title: ‘Sorry Karnataka’: Sonu Nigam apologises after 'Kannada remarks’ at Bengaluru event
content: Singer Sonu Nigam has publicly apologized to Karnataka's people following an FIR against him for allegedly making derogatory remarks about the Kannadiga community during a Bengaluru music event. The apology, which Sonu Nigam posted on Instagram, came after police issued a notice requiring the singer to appear for an investigation.

title: MP board 12th result: Priyal Dwivedi tops, check stream wise result
content: The Madhya Pradesh Board of Secondary Education has announced the class 12th board exam results, showcasing a pass percentage of 74.48%. Priyal Dwivedi topped the state in Science (Maths group) with 492/500. Gargi Agarwal and Divyanshu Tiwari secured the top position in Science (Biology).

title: JPMorgan Chase CEO on 'friend' Warren Buffet: He represents everything that…
content: Warren Buffett, the CEO of Berkshire Hathaway, announced his retirement, set for the end of 2025, with Greg Abel succeeding him. Jamie Dimon praised Buffett's integrity and impact on American business. Bill Gates also shared his gratitude, highlighting Buffett's mentorship and transformative influence, emphasizing his enduring legacy and the company's future under Abel's leadership.

title: Surprise and Shock as ChatGPT maker takes HUGE U-Turn: It is Elon Musk or ...
content: In a surprising turn, ChatGPT creator OpenAI will remain under nonprofit control, reversing plans for a for-profit transition. This decision follows internal debates, scrutiny from Microsoft and Elon Musk, and concerns raised by authorities. Microsoft, a major investor, reportedly sought greater control, while Musk sued OpenAI, alleging abandonment of its original mission.

title: Moody's cuts India's 2025 GDP growth forecast to 6.3%
content: Moody's Ratings has revised India's GDP growth forecast for 2025 to 6.3% due to global policy uncertainty and trade limitations. Geopolitical friction with Pakistan and terror attacks present additional risks. While maintaining a 6.5% growth prediction for 2026, Moody's anticipates the RBI will implement rate cuts to bolster domestic economic growth.

title: Virat Kohli–Rahul Vaidya row: What's happening?
content: IPL 2025 is witnessing off-field drama as singer Rahul Vaidya mocks Virat Kohli over a social media 'like' incident involving influencer Avneet Kaur. Kohli blamed Instagram's algorithm, leading to Vaidya's sarcastic response and alleged blocking. This sparked a fan backlash, with Vaidya hitting back, criticizing Kohli's fans and questioning Kohli's character, escalating the situation into a full-blown social media feud.

title: Amazon is changing its salary structure, here's who the new guidelines favour
content: Amazon is revamping its compensation strategy, rewarding veteran top performers with up to 110% of their pay range for consistent excellence over four years. First-time high achievers and those with fluctuating performance will see reduced payouts.

title: Ray Dalio, the man who predicted 2008 recession, says Trump Tariff pushing US to recession
content: Ray Dalio, who predicted the 2008 crisis, warns that mishandled economic policies, particularly Trump's tariffs, could push the U.S. into a recession. He likens the tariffs' disruptive implementation to destabilizing the production system. Despite a tariff pause, Goldman Sachs estimates a significant chance of a recession within the next year, highlighting growing economic uncertainty.

title: Gautami Kapoor reveals wanting to gift her 16-yr-old daughter a pleasure toy
content: Gautami Kapoor considered gifting her daughter, Sia, a sex toy for her 16th birthday, aiming to empower her with open exploration and break from traditional parenting. While Sia was initially shocked, she now appreciates her mother's progressive thought. Kapoor's anecdote sparks conversation about motherhood, societal expectations, and a desire for her daughter to experience life's pleasures fully.

title: DC keep slipping after MI game; face uphill task of playoff qualification
content: Delhi Capitals' promising IPL 2025 campaign faces derailment after a shocking loss to Mumbai Indians triggered a slump. Once poised for playoffs, DC now struggles, sitting fifth with 13 points. Experts Piyush Chawla and Sanjay Bangar emphasise the need for bold decisions and experienced players to step up, highlighting the team's batting order collapse.

title: Man caught transporting wife's body stuffed in gunny sack on scooter in Pune
content: In Pune, a 28-year-old man was apprehended for transporting his wife's body on a scooter. Rakesh Nishar, a labourer, allegedly strangled his 26-year-old wife, Babita, after a domestic dispute at their Dhayari residence. Police intercepted Nishar in the Nanded City area early Tuesday morning, discovering the body concealed in a gunny sack

title: How much gold reserves does the RBI keep in India?
content: The Reserve Bank of India significantly reduced its gold repatriation in the second half of fiscal year 2025, bringing home only 1.53 tonnes compared to 102.15 tonnes in the previous six months. Despite this slowdown, total gold holdings reached 879.59 metric tonnes by March 2025.

title: MP girl held for recording bathing videos of girl students, sharing with boyfriend
content: A tech institute in Jabalpur is facing a scandal reminiscent of the Chandigarh 'video leak' of 2022. A second-year female student has been arrested for allegedly recording inappropriate videos of other women in the hostel bathroom and sharing them with her boyfriend in Delhi. The accused was caught in the act by a fellow student, leading to a police complaint.

title: Kamala Harris trolled for her Met Gala look: ‘Cruella did it better’
content: Kamala Harris's Met Gala debut sparked online ridicule as her black-and-cream ensemble drew comparisons to Cruella de Vil. Social media users mocked the outfit, criticizing its design and perceived disconnect from everyday Americans. The gala, themed around Black dandyism, raised millions for the Costume Institute, but Harris's appearance became an unintended punchline, fueling criticism about her being out of touch.

title: Who backed Virat Kohli to make the No. 3 spot his own for India?
content: Virat Kohli credits MS Dhoni and Gary Kirsten for backing him at No. 3, where he amassed 15,303 international runs. Kohli, who considered leaving Royal Challengers Bengaluru after a point, valued the established relationships and mutual respect over seeking a new team. He prioritised playing cricket without constant judgment, cherishing his long-term connection with RCB.

title: US court blocks Trump's bid to end legal status for 400,000 migrants
content: A federal appeals court rejected Donald Trump's effort to end temporary legal status for thousands of migrants, hindering his immigration crackdown. The court declined to suspend a previous ruling blocking the Department of Homeland Security from ending humanitarian parole granted under President Biden. Judges argued the administration failed to demonstrate the legality of categorically terminating parole, favoring individual case reviews.

title: '60 died in past month': Ukrainian accused of killing monkeys with air gun
content: In Mathura's Anyour village, twelve monkeys were found dead under suspicious circumstances, with several others injured. Locals allege a Ukrainian national residing at Radha Madan Mohan Das Ashram shot the monkeys with an air gun. Police have arrested two men, including the Ukrainian suspect, and booked them under IPC and Prevention of Cruelty to Animals Act.

title: Gold rate today: Gold prices surge to Rs 95,950 per 10 grams
content: Gold prices surged on Tuesday due to increased safe-haven demand following President Trump's tariff announcements. Investors are also awaiting insights from the Federal Reserve's policy meeting, with expectations of maintained interest rates.

title: 'Remove 50% cap on reservation': Kharge's 3 suggestions to PM Modi on caste census
content: Congress President Mallikarjun Kharge has urged Prime Minister Modi to conduct a nationwide caste enumeration as part of the upcoming census. Kharge suggested adopting the "Telangana model" for the questionnaire and amending the Constitution to eliminate the 50% reservation cap. He also advocated for the immediate implementation of Article 15(5) to extend reservations to private educational institutions.

title: Watch: ED sleuths pin down fleeing ex-Congress MLA Chhokar outside Delhi hotel
content: Enforcement Directorate (ED) officials apprehended former Haryana Congress MLA Dharam Singh Chhokar at Delhi's Shangri-La Hotel following a tip-off. Chhokar, wanted in connection with a Rs 363 crore money laundering case, attempted to flee, leading to a chase and scuffle. He was eventually arrested and remanded to six days of ED custody by a Gurgaon court.

title: Cricketer Mohammed Shami receives threat mail, brother files FIR
content: Mohammed Shami received a death threat via email, prompting his brother Haseeb Ahmed to file a police complaint in Amroha. The email demanded Rs 1 crore and mentioned a person named Prabhakar. Police have registered a case and are investigating the threat, referring it to the cyber cell and crime branch to identify the accused.

title: 'New threats': Harvard over 'illegally withholding funding for lifesaving research'
content: Harvard University has strongly condemned the Trump administration’s decision to freeze federal research funding, calling it retaliation for a recent lawsuit and “illegal government overreach.” The university warned the move threatens vital scientific work and academic freedom. Education secretary Linda McMahon cited ethical and transparency concerns, escalating tensions over campus speech, diversity programs, and antisemitism at elite institutions.

title: Gold price prediction today: Should you buy or sell?
content: Gold price prediction: Gold prices experienced recent corrections after hitting record highs amidst global economic uncertainty. Trade tensions, dollar strength, and China's market holiday impacted bullion markets. Investors await the Federal Reserve's FOMC meeting for policy clarity.

title: Fitness expert recommends 10-min no-gym, no crunches workout to lose belly fat
content: Fitness expert Patrick Hong introduces a 10-minute postpartum workout designed to flatten the mum pooch without crunches or gym equipment. The routine includes dead bugs, high knees (or standing marches for those needing a gentler option), and glute bridge marches. These exercises target deep core muscles, boost heart rate, and protect the spine, making it ideal for busy moms.

title: J&K State Disaster Response Force Conducts Mock Drill At Dal Lake
content: As part of the Ministry of Home Affairs' initiative for nationwide civil defence preparedness, personnel from the Jammu and Kashmir State Disaster Response Force (SDRF) conducted a mock drill at Dal Lake, Srinagar, focusing on boat capsize scenario.

title: IPS Officer's Children Sexually Harassed During IPL Match In Bengaluru, FIR Registered
content: A case of sexual harassment and criminal intimidation was registered following a complaint alleging that a senior IPS officer's children were harassed during a recent IPL match at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium here, police said.

title: US Woman Reveals How Boyfriend Killed Daughter, Stuffed Body Inside Drawer
content: Two years after a toddler's body was found inside a hidden dresser drawer at an abandoned home in Indiana, the child's mother has pleaded guilty to two charges.

title: What Is A Mock Drill And What To Expect On May 7
content: A mock drill lets people rehearse what to do in a safe and controlled way, so they are ready if a real crisis happens.

title: Eknath Shinde-Ajit Pawar 'Rift' Widens As Deputy Chief Ministers Skip Events
content: The rift between the Eknath Shinde and Ajit Pawar seems to have widened with both skipping events organised by each other's parties or departments.

title: Pune Man Kills Wife, Gets Caught While Transporting Body
content: A man allegedly killed his 26-year-old wife and was caught transporting her body on a scooter in Maharashtra's Pune district on Tuesday, police said.

title: Friedrich Merz Set To Become Germany's Chancellor, Ending Political Stalemate
content: Conservative Friedrich Merz is set to be sworn in on Tuesday as Germany's new chancellor at a critical juncture as the economy battles its longest post-war downturn, relations with top security ally the United States fray and the far-right surges.

title: Australian Mushroom Murder Suspect Rejected Help Preparing Meal: Witness
content: An Australian woman accused of murdering three people with a toxic mushroom-laced lunch rejected offers of help before serving the dish, the sole guest to survive the deadly meal told a court on Tuesday.

title: Punjab, Haryana Asked To Work With Centre For Resolution In Sutlej-Yamuna Link Canal Row
content: The Supreme Court on Tuesday directed the governments of Punjab and Haryana to cooperate with the Centre to resolve the Sutlej-Yamuna Link (SYL) canal row.

title: New York Asks Judge To Bar Trump From Killing Manhattan's Congestion Pricing Program
content: New York launched its first-in-the-nation program in January, charging most passenger vehicles a toll of $9 during peak periods to enter Manhattan south of 60th Street, in a bid to cut congestion and raise funds to improve mass transit.

title: India Pak Tensions Live Updates: Pakistan Man Caught Near Line Of Control In J&K
content: India Pakistan Tensions LIVE Updates: Cross-border firing from the Pakistani side continued for the 12th straight night along the Line of Control.

title: 'LeT Involved?': UN Security Council Blasts Pakistan Over Pahalgam
content: Pakistan faced tough questions at the United Nations Security Council after it pressed for closed-door consultations over tensions with India in the aftermath of the Pahalgam terror attack.

title: "How Dare You?" Principal, Librarian Get Into Fistfight. Video Is Viral
content: An argument between a principal and a librarian escalated into a physical altercation, with both slapping and pulling each other's hair.

title: After Canada Rout, Pro-Khalistan Jagmeet Singh's Party Picks His Replacement
content: Canadian politician Jagmeet Singh was formally replaced as the New Democratic Party (NDP) chief on Monday evening after the party chose Vancouver-area MP Don Davies as its interim leader.

title: "Pak Thought They Had Advantage But...": Shashi Tharoor Decodes UN Talks
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor, a former diplomat who has served at the United Nations, has pointed out the "sad reality" of Security Council consultations after its members met last night to discuss the India-Pakistan tensions and Pahalgam attack.

title: ‘It’s a boy’: Israeli soldiers blow up Gaza building in viral gender reveal video
content: Israeli soldiers sparked outrage after a video surfaced showing them destroying a building in Gaza for a 'gender reveal party,' celebrating the birth of a boy with blue smoke. This occurred amidst escalating military actions, including a controversial plan approved by Prime Minister Netanyahu to capture and control the entire Gaza Strip indefinitely, potentially displacing hundreds of thousands of Palestinians.

title: Greece launches state app to limit children's screen time
content: Greece has launched "Kids Wallet," a government-operated mobile app enabling parents to monitor their children's screen time and verify their age on digital platforms. Parents can create accounts, set access restrictions, and confirm their child's age through official documents.

title: IPL Playoff Scenarios: SRH exit, DC in hunt; how important is GT vs MI?
content: Sunrisers Hyderabad's IPL playoff hopes were dashed after a washout, while Delhi Capitals gained a point, keeping their top-two aspirations alive. The result puts pressure on LSG, needing wins in their remaining games. DC's playoff chances hinge on their upcoming matches against PBKS, GT, and MI, with various scenarios determining their fate.

title: 'Pakistan's grandstanding flops again': UNSC meet yields no outcome
content: The United Nations Security Council convened closed-door consultations on Monday to address the escalating tensions between India and Pakistan, following a warning from secretary-general António Guterres about the deteriorating relations. The meeting was prompted by the recent terror attack in Pahalgam, Jammu and Kashmir, which resulted in the deaths of 26 civilians.

title: Met Gala 2025: What’s on the food menu? REVEALED
content: Chef Kwame Onwuachi prepared the food for the Met Gala. Guests enjoyed his fusion cuisine. Megan Thee Stallion shared a video of the menu. It included cornbread and caviar, lobster rolls, and vegan lox. Chicken and plantain, truffle chopped cheese, and hamachi were also served. The chef's unique style impressed everyone at the event.

title: Families of IPS, I-T officers clash over seat at Diamond Box during RCB match
content: During an IPL match between RCB and CSK in Bengaluru, a heated dispute erupted in the Diamond Box between the families of a senior Indian Police Service officer and an income tax commissioner over their seating arrangements. The argument escalated, leading to allegations of intimidation, sexual harassment, and outraging modesty.

title: Bill Gates writes 'Congratulations' message for Warren Buffet: 'My life changed…
content: Bill Gates has lauded Warren Buffett as a mentor, friend, and one of history's greatest investors and philanthropists, following Berkshire Hathaway's shareholder meeting. Gates emphasized Buffett's profound impact on his life, highlighting his integrity, humor, and generosity. He also acknowledged Buffett's legacy of inspiring future generations through both business acumen and philanthropic endeavors, noting their 30-year friendship and collaborative efforts.

title: Pak violates ceasefire along LoC for 12th day, Army responds in 'proportionate' manner
content: Tensions escalate along the Line of Control as Pakistani troops initiated unprovoked firing in eight forward areas of Jammu and Kashmir, marking the 12th consecutive night of ceasefire violations. This follows the Pahalgam terror attack, prompting a strong response from Indian forces.

title: Uncapped, Unfazed, Unmatched! India’s young batters blaze IPL 2025
content: IPL 2025 witnesses the emergence of exciting uncapped Indian opening batters, showcasing their talent and potential. Ayush Mhatre, Abishek Porel, Priyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh, and Vaibhav Suryavanshi have impressed with their explosive performances. Suryavanshi, at just 14, became the youngest T20 centurion, while others like Arya have displayed dynamic strokeplay, offering a glimpse into the future of Indian cricket.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens flat; BSE Sensex above 80,700
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened flat in trade on Tuesday. While Nifty50 was near 24,450, BSE Sensex was above 80,700.

title: Elon Musk is no longer ‘Elon Musk’ on Twitter; changes his profile name to…
content: Elon Musk has once again altered his X display name, this time to 'Gorklon Rust,' sparking speculation about its meaning. The moniker appears to blend references to Grok, Musk's AI chatbot, and the Rust programming language, potentially linked to xAI's infrastructure.

title: Tips from Elizabeth Francis, 115-year-old who lived through both World Wars
content: Elizabeth Francis, the third-oldest person in the world, passed away at 115, leaving behind a legacy of resilience. Her life spanned numerous historical events, and she attributed her longevity to strong faith, a healthy lifestyle with home-grown vegetables, and a dedicated work ethic. She also valued family connections and expressing herself openly.

title: Israel launches airstrikes in Yemen after missile lands near Tel Aviv
content: Israel launched airstrikes on Yemen’s Hodeidah port Monday, injuring 21, in retaliation for a Houthi missile that landed near Tel Aviv’s Ben Gurion Airport—the first to bypass Israeli defenses. The Houthis vowed further attacks and warned airlines to avoid Israel. The escalation highlights rising regional tensions as Yemen’s Houthis intensify actions in response to Israel’s Gaza offensive.

title: 'To accommodate Dhoni ...': Gavaskar urges cap on uncapped player salaries
content: Sunil Gavaskar has expressed concerns over BCCI's decision. The board altered rules to favour MS Dhoni as an uncapped player. Gavaskar questions the high salaries for uncapped players in IPL. He believes this move could harm Indian cricket's future. Gavaskar urges BCCI to reverse the rule change. He wants to limit salaries for uncapped players.

title: "Reservation Like Train Compartment...": Supreme Court Judge's Big Remark
content: Caste-based reservation in the country has become like a train compartment and people who got into this compartment don't want to let others in, a Supreme Court judge said today.

title: Ex-US Cop Charged For Inappropriate Behaviour With Crew During Flight
content: A former California Highway Patrol officerallegedly slapped a male flight attendant on the buttocks, exposed his genitals, and made lewd comments and gestures aboard a JetBlue flight.

title: Historic First For Supreme Court - Judges' Assets, Appointment Process Public
content: In a bid to enhance transparency, the Supreme Court on Monday said it has uploaded statements of assets of judges on its website, in accordance with a full-court decision to place the relevant details in the public domain.

title: Blackouts, Evacuation, Hotlines: Details Of Tomorrow's Security Drill
content: Following directions from the Centre, states and Union Territories are preparing for a civil defence security drill tomorrow

title: Opinion: Blog | Who Is 'Natural'? The Selective Science Behind Testosterone 'Bans'
content: While testosterone takes centre stage in disputes of this nature, regulatory bodies often ignore other factors affecting athletic performance, without proper scientific backing and justification.

title: NWSL: Orlando Pride top, Naeher makes history
content: a week of NWSL action is in the books, which means it's time for ESPN's Power Rankings . our writers studied the action from across Matchday 7 to come up with this week's order of all 14 teams in the league .

title: The most astounding numbers of Aaron Judge's torrid start to 2025
content: Aaron Judge is hitting an astounding .423/.510/.777 with 10 extra-base hits during his eighth-inning double Sunday . he leads the majors in batting average, on-base percentage, slugging percentage, OPS and hits .

title: 👀 Best athlete fits at 2025 Met Gala
content: the 2025 Met Gala has officially kicked off in new york city . some of the biggest sports stars are in attendance . the gala features a strong presence behind the scenes . athletes have made headlines at the annual fundraising event in previous years .

title: Knicks rally down 20, steal home court from C's
content: the new york Knicks beat the defending champions Boston Celtics in overtime . the team was bludgeoned by the club on the offensive glass . but when they called timeout down by 20, they managed to stay composed .

title: This time at UCF, Scott Frost won't need to catch lightning in a bottle
content: Scott Frost is reuniting with the UCF Knights as their new head coach . the Knights are now in a power 4 conference, and there is now a 12-team college football playoff . he is a new coach at the university of central Florida .

title: 2026 recruiting class top 25 rankings: Georgia debuts after landing five-star QB
content: it has been nearly a decade since the Buckeyes have signed a top-five class . the Trojans have yet to make an appearance in the college football playoff . it is anchored by two five-star recruits, both of whom have come on board .

title: How Liverpool move on from Alexander-Arnold
content: mark Ogden wonders if Trent Alexander-Arnold's best chance of success on the pitch is at Liverpool . the 26-year-old has announced he will leave the club when his contract expires at the end of the season . he revealed he feels like he needs a new change and a challenge for him as a player .

title: NBA conference semifinals: Late surge gives Nuggets 1-0 lead over OKC
content: the second round of the 2025 playoffs is here, and our insiders have you covered for every game of the Eastern and Western conference semifinals . the no. 4 seed Indiana Pacers kicked off the East semis by taking home-court advantage away from the No. 1-seeded Cleveland Cavaliers with a 121-112 victory .
